sections.heading: assessor; residence requirements
sections.text: A county assessor need not be a resident of the county when he or she files for election as county assessor, but a county assessor shall reside in a county for which he or she holds office.SourceLaws 1969, c. 623, ยง 6, p. 2522;R.S.1943, (1986), ยง 77-426;Laws 1990, LB
